ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that when an Account Contact Relation is associated with an Account of type 'Provider', and the user's role contains 'EDRD', the Contact's related Account must be of type 'Patient'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "EDRD"), Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider', Contact.Account.RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Patient', INCLUDES(Roles, 'Physician'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.Provider_Type__pc, 'Physician')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An EDRD user cannot associate a Physician with a Provider Account unless the Contact's related Account is 'Patient'.
